summary:
Reylo Force Bond Time in Bed
Rey lying in bed when suddenly she senses Ben’s presence but doesn’t turn to face him. 
Rey: You...
body:
Reylo Force Bond Time in Bed

Rey lying in bed when suddenly she senses Ben’s presence but doesn’t turn to face him.

Rey: You can say you miss me, Ben. I won’t make fun of you.

Ben: I miss you.

Rey turns around to see naked Ben lying by her side.

Rey: …

Kylo: …

Rey looks at Kylo’s crotch.

Rey: You really do miss me.

tags: please this game looks so fuckinh good
summary: They’re releasing a new Star Wars game in November, and it is a completely story based game where you play as a Jedi.  The game...
body:
WHY IS NO ONE TALKING ABOUT THE NEW STAR WARS GAME

They’re releasing a new Star Wars game in November, and it is a completely story based game where you play as a Jedi. The game is called Jedi: Fallen Order and is set after order 66. You play as a young Padawan named Cal who as gone into hiding as a result of the killings, and is trying to stay under the radar as the Empire purges the galaxy of remaining force users. You follow his journey along with his droid unit, as he continues to learn to come out of hiding and face the Empire head on.

Here’s the trailer, it honest to god gave me goose bumps

blog.name: alicestill
blog.title: Still Life
blog.description: Unbashed SW/ST/MCU fan - Slytherin - sunbug1138 on AO3

title: Title Thoughts
body:
My initial reaction was a bit meh? wah? But I was still coming down of the adrenaline hit of the opening…

But having thought about it, it has really grown on me.

I was happy to see that my own theory of it featuring a verb beginning was R . Rise fitting well with Revenge and Return.

Then as I thought more about it, and taking ‘Skywalker’ literally, and in this case not in the Chiss’ parlance that suggests navigator, but instead the one we see above our heads every day and has featured significantly through out the moves so far; the Sun. We’ve had binary sunsets, a lot of sunsets. I’ve said before I’d like to see Ben/Kylo and Rey round things out watching a binary sun rise. And it ties in neatly with Leia’s adage, hope is like the Sun, if you don’t belive it when you can’t see it you’ll never get through the night.  And it is darkest before the dawn. Not to mention Son/Sun and Rey/Ray.

It is my dearest wish and hope that we are on the edge of this new dawn and with the full extend and truth of Palpatine’s meddling (now too a literal phantom menace….) revealed and dealt with the galaxy can begin the real work of working together and righting itself.

tags: star wars the rise of skywalker
summary: What if Rey is going to there to get proof to turn Kylo Ren completely? We know that Vader turns to the light at the end of...
body:
Guys! About the Death Star wreckage in the teaser…

What if Rey is going to there to get proof to turn Kylo Ren completely? We know that Vader turns to the light at the end of Return of the Jedi when he saves Luke, but what if Kylo Ren doesn’t believe that unless there’s proof. And the Death Star is bound to have some sort of security footage. Would also explain Palpatine’s laugh in the trailer.


Also, wouldn’t Palpatine’s ghost be there? If not Palpatine himself if he’s indeed alive as the teaser trailer implies?

summary:
Not to be St*r W*rs™

 on main but I cannot stop thinking about when Cassian Jeron Andor said “We don't all have the luxury of...
body: Not to be St*r W*rs™ on main but I cannot stop thinking about when Cassian Jeron Andor said “We don’t all have the luxury of deciding when and where we want to care about something.” Like. He Really Did That. He really told a white woman to check her privilege. Iconic.

summary: Skywalker v Solo - My Thoughts on Nomenclature & Fan Reactions to the New Title
title: Skywalker v Solo - My Thoughts on Nomenclature & Fan Reactions to the New Title
body:
Half the Reylo fandom is making posts like ‘OMG Ben is gonna change his name to Skywalker & marry Rey so she’ll be a Skywalker & that’s what the title means!’ & honestly if I have any wish for this film it’s that I do not want this to happen. The marrying part, sure, but the name? Fuck no.

He’s a Solo, & that is important. As soon as we knew Ben’s surname was Solo & not Organa or Organa-Solo, there were people getting pissy about how it ignored Leia & was super problematic or what the fuck ever. Which ignored the fact that in their relationship, Leia had the power, raised as royalty, daughter of a beloved queen-turned-senator & a Jedi-Knight-turned-Sith-Lord. Han was a fucking nobody who married up & found himself in a world he never felt he belonged in. And I’m sure other people felt the same. In the Aftermath books they keep their marriage lowkey at first, & when a character finds out they have a ‘really? him?’ reaction. And that was someone who respected Leia & was loyal to the rebel cause. You gotta imagine that a lot of people were way less kind & Han had to have picked up on that.

I feel like it’s also telling that, as the ultimate legacy character, Ben was given the surname with the least amount of actual legacy attached to it. Han was an orphan & the closest either of his parents had to having an impact on the galaxy was the possibility that his father may have helped build the Falcon.

Yes, the name was given to him by some random guy, but it was one that summed him up, & he embraced it. Also Finn’s name was given to him by a random guy too & if he changed it fandom would fucking riot so don’t gimme that excuse about how that’s a reason the name Solo doesn’t matter.

Han also had nothing in the way of actual possessions. All he had was his name, his ship, & his skills. We know from a heartbreaking line in Bloodline that he never got the opportunity to pass on his skills to Ben as much as he’d hoped (presumably because Ben was pushed towards Jedi training at the expense of all else). Taking away the name as well seems like an extra fuck you, even if Ben still gets the Falcon.

Han also reached out to his son, even knowing the risks involved, & his sacrifice escalated the conflict within his son, paving the way for eventual redemption. I kinda feel like a name change would throw that pivotal moment under the bus.

And then there’s all the stuff about how this is the conclusion to the Skywalker saga. It just seems weird to end a series by having a character who was part of a family but didn’t share the surname randomly changing his name even though the only other surviving member of said family also doesn’t have the surname. Some mixed signals there. Not like you need to have him rejecting his name for the sake of symbolism, as he’ll already be rejecting the Kylo Ren name by redeeming himself.


That was rambly as fuck but I felt like getting my feelings out on the matter & boy do I have a lot of feelings on this

That was rambly as fuck but I felt like getting my feelings out on the matter & boy do I have a lot of feelings on this

summary: Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It's the only way for you to become what you are meant to be
body:
Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It’s the only way for you to become what you are meant to be

Kylo Ren, The Last Jedi.

Guys, I just realized…Palps is the past. It hasn’t died. If Kylo kills him, he will become who he is meant to be (Ben).

reblog.comment:
